title: Bitcoin Stocks To Add to Your Watchlist - October 16th
description: IREN, Marathon Digital, and Cleanspark are the three Bitcoin stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat's stock screener tool. title: Crypto market shows weak conviction after Friday’s sharp drop
description: The US-China trade scare triggered a violent crypto selloff, wiping out nearly $1 trillion in market cap within an hour. While Bitcoin, Ethereum, and altcoins have since recovered some ground, confidence remains fragile as low trading volumes persist. We analyze key charts for BTC, ETH, SOL, and XRP to gauge what comes next.
